amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 124 pertaining to drilling margins or static downhole mud weight.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in House Report 114-683 to strike section 124.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Castor (FL) amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 237 (Roll no. 423).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Castor (FL) amendment (A011) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 237 (Roll no. 423).
